summary: The Block is pleased to announce its four part APAC focused webinar series, The Exchange, in co-operation with ChainNews. Part one of the series will see The Block's Celia Wan exploring topics in Open Finance with investors and industry leaders from East to West.
title: The Block presents: The Exchange APAC Webinar Series
content: The Block is pleased to announce its four part APAC focused webinar series, The Exchange, in co-operation with ChainNews. Part one of the series will see The Block’s Celia Wan exploring topics in Open Finance with investors and industry leaders from East to West.
Part one will take place on June 30th 10:30am CST / 10:30pm EST and will feature:
Haseeb Qureshi – Managing Partner at Dragonfly Capital Partners
Mia GeGe Deng – Investor at Dragonfly Capital Partners
Mindao Yang – Founder and CEO at dForce
Miable Jiang – Principal at Multicoin Capital
Pan Chao – China Lead at MakerDAO
You can register for the event below, or via QR code provided in the featured image above.
